Summary: Saw what I thought was a meteor or bomb or something falling
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Springboro
There was one other sighting in Springboro on or around September 5th 2009
divs: sighting details i was on my way home from work last night (spet. 5th) and was coming south on interstate 75 when off to my left i noticed a large, teardrop-shaped object appearing to come slowly down out of the sky. it was reddish-orange in color. as i continued to watch, it split into two distinct parts, also reddish-orange in color and teardrop shaped, but soon after splitting, winked out- whether due to cloud cover or something else. however, perhaps less than 20 seconds later, i began to see lights winking on, one by one, almost as if they were splitting from one another. these were not reddish-orange, but were more the color of lights one would expect from a helicopter; that is to say they were bright and had a white-yellow color to them. these objects appeared to also be moving downward at a slow rate while also spreading out a bit. i watched as they descended toward a tree line (as this was just after i had exited the highway at the springboro\franklin exit) and i attempted to drive down a side street which headed in the general direction of these objects to see if i could learn more. i soon lost sight of them, however, as trees blocked my view. i turned around and headed back the way i had come, and cannot be certain, but thought i heard the distant sound of a helicopter.
